name: Nightlight (Koicrow)
description:
Nightlight was created for my first jam, Platformer Week hosted by 8 Bits to Infinity.

"You're a young child who fears the dark. However, it isn't the absence of light that frightens you. It's the monsters that lurk there, prowling and waiting to pounce. One night, all of that changes when a peculiar friends visits you and takes you on a strange journey to remedy those fears. Your trusty weapon: your nightlight."

Due to overscoping, this is only a prototype showcasing a few of the mechanics that were added, so there isn't much to do. Hope anyone who wants to give it a look enjoys it regardless.

Artwork and development by me.

Music and sounds by Chris Logsdon - https://chrislsound.com/
